sentences.en: All and half can be used with countable and uncountable nouns.
sentences.cn: Allandhalf与可数名词和不可数名词连用均可.

sentences.en: Both is used only with plural countable nouns and refers to two in number.
sentences.cn: both只与复数的可数名词连用,所指数目为二.

sentences.en: Countable and uncountable nouns: ice cream , salad , chicken.
sentences.cn: 比较下列名词 --- 可数名词与不可数名词.

sentences.en: Discusses the computational problem about union of countable infinite of countably infinite sets.
sentences.cn: 讨论了可数无穷个可数无穷集合的并的计算问题.

sentences.en: Do, the mount of the cost of a countable application.
sentences.cn: 这样, 安装的费用数应用.

sentences.en: Eachband everybare generally used as determiners before singular countable nouns.
sentences.cn: 一般都作限定词,用于单数可数名词之前.

sentences.en: English nouns can be practically classified into countable nouns and uncountable nouns.
sentences.cn: 英语名词可以从实用的角度分为可数名词及不可数名词.

sentences.en: Hardware is generally tangible and its amount is a countable characteristic.
sentences.cn: 硬件通常是有形产品,其量具有计数的特性.

sentences.en: Is this word a countable noun or an uncountable noun?
sentences.cn: 一般说来,这里我们用代词来代名词.

sentences.en: Nouns such as book, pen, apple and toy are countable nouns.
sentences.cn: 像书 、 笔 、 苹果和玩具这类名词,称其为可数名词.

sentences.en: Only countable nouns can be used in the plural.
sentences.cn: 只有可数名词才有复数形式.

sentences.en: Point Countable Covers and the Theory of Maps.
sentences.cn: 点可数覆盖与映射理论“, ”

sentences.en: Scanning can be recursive and countable files extensions can de defined.
sentences.cn: 扫描是递归式的,可以定义被扫描的文件的扩展名.

sentences.en: She saying nouns have two types – countable and uncountable.
sentences.cn: 她说名词有两种类型:可数及不可数名词.

sentences.en: The word " person " is a countable noun.
sentences.cn: person 这个词是个可数名词.

words.tran_cn: 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者

trans.tran_en: a countable noun has both a singular and a plural form
